org.itsnat.comp.text

Interface ItsNatFormattedTextField.ItsNatFormatterFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ItsNatFormatterFactoryDefault
    Enclosing interface:
    ItsNatFormattedTextField

    public static interface ItsNatFormattedTextField.ItsNatFormatterFactory
    Defines an ItsNat formatter factory. A formatter factory is used to create ItsNat formatters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItsNatFormattedTextField.ItsNatFormatter getItsNatFormatter(ItsNatFormattedTextField comp)
      Returns an appropiated formatter to the specified formatted text field.

    • Method Detail

      • getItsNatFormatter

        ItsNatFormattedTextField.ItsNatFormatter getItsNatFormatter(ItsNatFormattedTextField comp)
        Returns an appropiated formatter to the specified formatted text field.

        The target formatted text field is used to build the appropriated formatter, for instance using the current component value (ItsNatFormattedTextField.getValue()) to determine what kind of conversion is needed.

        Parameters:
        comp - the formatted text field used to build the formatter.
        Returns:
        the formatter.
